infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: Ma buu chinh needs to access your camera to be able to scan QR-codes of postal code.
infoPlist.NSContactsUsageDescription: This permission is not needed by the app, but it is required by an underlying API. If you see this dialog, contact us.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: Ma buu chinh needs to know your location to find place's postal code around you.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysUsageDescription: Ma buu chinh needs to know your location to find place's postal code around you.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: Ma buu chinh needs to know your location to find place's postal code around you.
infoPlist.NSLocationUsageDescription: Ma buu chinh needs to know your location to find place's postal code around you.
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: This permission is not needed by the app, but it is required by an underlying API. If you see this dialog, contact us.
